diadem.version:
oxpath-cli v1.0.1 (2017) OXPath v2.2.0 (2017)
Copyright (c) 2011-2015, DIADEM Team (http://diadem.cs.ox.ac.uk/) Copyright (c) 2016-2017, OXPath Team (https://github.com/oxpath/)

cli.query-desc: file containing the oxpath expression to evaluate
cli.variables-desc: file containing a variable dictionary (Java Properties format) for an oxpath template
cli.output-format-desc: output extracted data in a specified format("xml" is default). rscsv and rsjdbc stream basic records into CSV or relational database, respectively. hcsv and hjdbc serialise hierarchy of entities into a single denormalised relation in the form of CSV or into the relational database
cli.xmlcdata-desc: If XML mode is enabled, the attribute's value is wrapped into CDATA sections, useful when the output contains not allowed XML characters (disabled by default)
cli.jdbcpar-desc: XML file with JDBC parameters, such as db.driver, db.url, db.user, db.password, db.schema.schema-name ("public" is default), db.schema.table-name, db.override, db.batch-size
cli.rsent-desc: name of the entity to be extracted
cli.rsattrs-desc: list of attributes to be extracted in a form a,b,c,d
cli.hents-desc: list of attributes to be extracted in a form a/b,c/d
cli.multival-desc: allow multiple values per attribute (disabled by default)
cli.output-desc: the path of the output file in case of XML, CSV or JSON output handler (not specified by default, output into the default console)
cli.logfile-desc: log4j configuration file. If not provided, a default one is applied

browser.exec-desc: a custom executable path for Firefox (not specified by default)
browser.xvfb-desc: Firefox running in the X virtual framebuffer (disabled by default)
browser.display-desc: the display port to use in the XVFB mode, e.g., :0 (not specified by default)
browser.img-desc: enable browser images download (disabled by default)
browser.plugins-desc: enable browser's plugins, e.g., flash, java (disabled by default)
browser.width-desc: specify the browser window width (default is 1280)
browser.height-desc: specify the browser window height (default is 800)

engine.autocomplete-desc: select first autocomplete suggestion (disabled by default)
